Module io.netty.codec.http2
Package io.netty5.handler.codec.http2

Class HttpToHttp2ConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty5.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty5.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder
        • io.netty5.handler.codec.http2.Http2ConnectionHandler
          • io.netty5.handler.codec.http2.HttpToHttp2ConnectionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, Http2LifecycleManager
    @UnstableApi
public class HttpToHttp2ConnectionHandler
extends Http2ConnectionHandler
    Translates HTTP/1.x object writes into HTTP/2 frames.

    See InboundHttp2ToHttpAdapter to get translation from HTTP/2 frames to HTTP/1.x objects.

      • write

        public Future<Void> write​(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                          Object msg)
        Handles conversion of HttpMessage and HttpContent to HTTP/2 frames.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the ChannelHandlerContext for which the write operation is made
        msg - the message to write
        Returns:
        the Future which will be notified once the operation completes.
